Class GameWorld

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.World
GameWorld
public class GameWorld
extends city.cs.engine.World
This is the class that holds the game world

    • GameWorld

      public GameWorld​(Settings settings, int level, Game game)
      Initialises a new world with settings and at a level
      Parameters:
      settings - takes a Settings object for the settings of the world
      level - takes an integer and starts the world at that level
      game - takes a Game object

    • GameWorld

      public GameWorld​(Settings settings, java.lang.String data, Game game)
      Initialises a new world from saved string
      Parameters:
      settings - takes a Settings object for the settings of the world
      data - is a comma delimited String containing balls position, balls velocity , player score, number of lives left and current level information.
      game - takes a Game object
